Translations.Text: Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de. Wanshi [zuizhong] dou jiang gui dao an la nali qu [panjue].

Nimen [musilin] shi wei renlei er chansheng de zui youxiu de minzu [zhu]. Nimen quan ren xingshan, zhi ren zuo'e, xinyang an la. Jiaru you jing ren [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] ye xinyang, na dui tamen shi zui hao de. Tamen zhong youxie shi xinshi, dan tamen da bufen shi beini zhe.
Tamen jue buneng shanghai nimen, zhishi yixie wei bu zu dao de darao eryi. Jiaru tamen jingong nimen, tamen biding baibei, erqie de bu dao renhe yuanzhu.

Wulun tamen zai nali pi fa xian, tamen dou jiang zao xiuru, chufei you an la de mengyue he renlei de mengyue baohu. Tamen zaoshou an la de qian nu. Tamen jiang zao [an la de] huimie, zhe shi yinwei tamen bu xinyang an la de jixiang he wangtu shahai xianzhimen, zhe shi yinwei tamen beini he chaoyue fadu.
You jing ren bingfei dou shi yi lei de. Tamen zhong you yiqun zhengzhi zhe, tamen zai yejian songdu an la de qishi bing [libai] koutou.
Tamen quexin an la he mori, quan ren xingshan, zhi ren zuo'e, zhengxian xingshan, zhexie ren shi shanren.
Fanshi tamen suo zuo de shanxing, jue bu hui bei fouren. An la dui jingwei zhe shi quanzhi de.
